meanings.definition: To assemble or put together in advance.
meanings.sent1: The workers preassembled the furniture to save time during the event setup.
meanings.sent2: I always preassemble my ingredients before starting to cook.
meanings.sent3: The team preassembled their presentation, but forgot to include the main slide!
meanings.sent4: She preassembled her outfit in her mind, but ended up wearing something completely different.
meanings.sent5: Preassembling the parts made the project much easier to complete.

meanings.definition: Already assembled before being used or installed.
meanings.sent1: The preassembled bookshelf was ready to use right out of the box.
meanings.sent2: I prefer buying preassembled furniture to save time on assembly.
meanings.sent3: The preassembled puzzle was missing a piece, making it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent4: Her preassembled thoughts on the matter were quickly proven wrong.
meanings.sent5: The preassembled tent made camping a breeze.
